title: Delicate Watercolors Combat Oversimplified 'Strong Black Woman' Stereotype
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Style - Today 
"In my work, I show another side of black women," artist Debra Cartwright explained to The Huffington Post. The Harlem-based artist creates ...
